description:
Tiara has just been accepted to the Flora Girls Academy for young witches. Her lifelong dream of becoming a powerful “light” to cleanse the world of magical beasts is now possible. But not before she hits the magical music books! Oh, and little did Tiara know that she’s about to take center stage in a classroom full of potential dropouts. Challenge accepted.

(Source: Funimation)

name.native: ラピスリライツ・スターズ

node.description:
__[Website](https://www.lapisrelights.com/unit/) | [Profile (Victor Entertainment)](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/-/Artist/A026102.html)__

__Introduction:__
Lapis Re:LiGHTs Stars is a collaboration of all the units (LiGHTs, IV KLORE, Konohana wa Otome, Sugar Pockets, Sadistic Candy, Supernova and Ray) in the Lapis Re:LiGHTs multimedia franchise. They made their debut in anime performing the opening to the show Lapis Re:LIGHTs, which aired on July 4, 2020.

__Lineup:__
The first unit, [LiGHTs](https://anilist.co/staff/180196/LiGHTs), consists of the characters [Tiara](https://anilist.co/character/163918/Tiara), [Rosetta](https://anilist.co/character/163912/Rosetta), [Lynette](https://anilist.co/character/163911/Lynette), [Lavie](https://anilist.co/character/163919/Lavie) and [Ashley](https://anilist.co/character/163910/Ashley), who are voiced by [Yukari Anzai](https://anilist.co/staff/128650/Yukari-Anzai), [Risa Kubota](https://anilist.co/staff/123782/Risa-Kubota), [Mizuki Yamamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/163938/Mizuki-Yamamoto), [Live Mukai](https://anilist.co/staff/163940/Live-Mukai) and [Iori Saeki](https://anilist.co/staff/139844/Iori-Saeki). 
The second unit, IV KLORE, consists of the characters [Emilia](https://anilist.co/character/163927/Emilia), [Alpha](https://anilist.co/character/163916/Alpha), [Salsa](https://anilist.co/character/163926/Salsa) and [Garnet](https://anilist.co/character/163928/Garnet), who are voiced by [Hazuki Hoshino](https://anilist.co/staff/163944/Hazuki-Hoshino), [Tomomi Mineuchi](https://anilist.co/staff/124907/Tomomi-Mineuchi), [Yuu Sasahara](https://anilist.co/staff/127725/Yuu-Sasahara) and [Youko Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/163942/Youko-Nakayama). 
The third unit, Konohana wa Otome, consists of the characters [Nadeshiko](https://anilist.co/character/163932/Nadeshiko), [Tsubaki](https://anilist.co/character/163933/Tsubaki) and [Kaede](https://anilist.co/character/163934/Kaede), who are voiced by [Rina Honizumi](https://anilist.co/staff/125577/Rina-Honizumi), [Arisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/123369/Arisa-Suzuki) and [Yuuko Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/123269/Yuuko-Oono).
The fourth unit, Sugar Pockets, consists of the characters [Ratura](https://anilist.co/character/163917/Ratura), [Champe](https://anilist.co/character/163913/Champe) and [Maryberry](https://anilist.co/character/163925/Maryberry), who are voiced by [Yukimi Hayase](https://anilist.co/staff/163943/Yukimi-Hayase), [Seika Hirose](https://anilist.co/staff/163939/Seika-Hirose) and [Hikaru Akao](https://anilist.co/staff/125016/Hikaru-Akao).
The fifth unit, Sadistic Candy, consists of the characters [Angelica](https://anilist.co/character/163922/Angelica) and [Lucifer](https://anilist.co/character/163929/Lucifer), who are voiced by [Yuuka Amemiya](https://anilist.co/staff/163941/Yuuka-Amemiya) and [Risae Matsuda](https://anilist.co/staff/119960/Risae-Matsuda).
The sixth unit, Supernova, consists of the characters [Yue](https://anilist.co/character/163931/Yue), [Millefeuille](https://anilist.co/character/163923/Millefeuille) and [Fiona](https://anilist.co/character/163921/Fiona), who are voiced by [Yuu Sakuragi](https://anilist.co/staff/163946/Yuu-Sakuragi), [Saeko Oku](https://anilist.co/staff/163945/Saeko-Oku) and [Haruka Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/140813/Haruka-Itou).
The seventh and final unit, Ray, consists of the characters [Eliza](https://anilist.co/character/163920/Eliza), [Chloe](https://anilist.co/character/163924/Chloe), [Angers](https://anilist.co/character/163915/Angers), [Camilla](https://anilist.co/character/163914/Camilla) and [Yuzuriha](https://anilist.co/character/163930/Yuzuriha), who are voiced by [Kana Hanazawa](https://anilist.co/staff/95185/Kana-Hanazawa), [Yoshino Nanjou](https://anilist.co/staff/96592/Yoshino-Nanjou), [Yuuka Amemiya](https://anilist.co/staff/163941/Yuuka-Amemiya), [Sumire Uesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/109441/Sumire-Uesaka) and [Ayane Sakura](https://anilist.co/staff/106622/Ayane-Sakura).

__[Archived Profile (onetrap)](http://www.ageha.net/archives/onetrap_creator/akiura_tomohiro)__

__Introduction:__
Tomohiro Akiura is a music producing unit consisting of the duo Akihiro Shimoura and Tomomi Akiyama, who works as creators for the creative team onetrap.

__Members:__
\- Akihiro Shimoura (下浦晃裕)
\- Tomomi Akiyama (秋山智美)

__[Website](https://www.lapisrelights.com/unit/lights/)__

__LiGHTs__ is a Japanese music unit in the Lapis Re:LiGHTs multimedia franchise that consists of the characters [Tiara](https://anilist.co/character/163918/Tiara), [Rosetta](https://anilist.co/character/163912/Rosetta), [Lynette](https://anilist.co/character/163911/Lynette), [Lavie](https://anilist.co/character/163919/Lavie) and [Ashley](https://anilist.co/character/163910/Ashley), who are voiced by [Yukari Anzai](https://anilist.co/staff/128650/Yukari-Anzai), [Risa Kubota](https://anilist.co/staff/123782/Risa-Kubota), [Mizuki Yamamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/163938/Mizuki-Yamamoto), [Live Mukai](https://anilist.co/staff/163940/Live-Mukai) and [Iori Saeki](https://anilist.co/staff/139844/Iori-Saeki) respectively.

__[Archived Profile (onetrap)](http://www.ageha.net/archives/onetrap_creator/akiura_tomohiro)__

__Introduction:__
Tomohiro Akiura is a music producing unit consisting of the duo Akihiro Shimoura and Tomomi Akiyama, who works as creators for the creative team onetrap.
